title: Absolutely gorgeous 3 bed room apartment now available.
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 235263175', 'Rent: $2,900 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/28/2022', 'Beautifully renovated 3-bed apt located on the 1st floor of a nice, walk-up building.', 'The apt has nicely refinished natural hardwood floors and receives plenty of sunlight throughout.', 'The living room is a very good size and has exposed brick giving it the perfect NYC charm.', 'The kitchen has stainless steel appliances.', 'One bedroom fits a queen sized bed and more.', 'The other 2 rooms fit full-sized beds.', '- Spacious living room', '- Close to 1 and A train', '- Hardwood floors', '- Stainless Appliances', '- Great natural lighting', '- Dishwasher', '- Laundry in building', "Areas of Interest: Central Park, Morningside Heights, Columbia University, Upper West Side, Upper East Side, The Apollo Theatre, Sylvia's.", 'Harlem is a thriving neighborhood - has great community spirit, great architecture, great arts and culture... pretty much great everything.', 'The lifeline of this neighborhood is 125th Street, a thoroughfare known for the Apollo Theatre, a zillion stores, plenty of parks and access to various Express trains... be in Midtown in minutes!', 'For more information please contact Gary Jimenez:', '332-234-8385', 'Gary@crosstown.nyc']
